pdf("Freq.pdf",width=9,height=6)
data <- read.table("F1E.input.xls",header=T)
plot(x=data[,1],y=data[,2],xlab="Length",ylab="Count",type="l",col="#E39500",axes=FALSE,cex.lab=1.5,main='SV freq',cex.main=2,pch=15)
points(data[,1],data[,2],pch=15,cex=0.2,col="#E39500")
points(data[,1],data[,3],pch=16,cex=0.2,col="#53B3E9")
lines(data[,1],data[,3],col="#53B3E9",pch=16,type="l")
axis(side=1,at=c(50,100,150,200,250,300,350,400,500,600,700,800,900,1000))
axis(side=2,at=c(0,300,600,900,1200,1500,1800,2100))
legend(850,2000,c("Insertion","Deletion"),col=c("#E39500","#53B3E9"),text.col=c("#E39500","#53B3E9"),pch=c(15,16))
box()
